item.title: Addskillxp to a object -Problem-
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

[s]I know but i did my Skil level to 1 and my exp the same…

But if i used that chest It gives only the sendmessages and takes my key… and i dont get any exp[/s]

EDIT: I have make a new account and uses that same chest but now i got another problem!
I get 1000 Attack exp =(

EDIT: Fixed by myself this was the problem if you wanna know:
This is what i had: addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[18]), 0);
And this what i got now addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[18]), 18);

Read full topic

item.title: Addskillxp to a object -Problem-
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I got a problem i wanna add exp to a object
that if you use a object you get Exp,

I did compile it but it Dont work
Its SlayerSkill but i renamed to reputation [18] = Slayer

Here is the code that i used on case 103

case 103: // Chest if (playerHasItemAmount(275, 1)) {// deleteItem(275, getItemSlot(275), 1); addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[18]), 0); teleportToX = 3214; teleportToY = 3425; sendMessage("You did your key in the chest"); sendMessage("And teleported back to varrock"); sendMessage("Congratulations u get some Reputation exp"); } else { sendMessage("You need a key for open the chest"); } break;

I hope someone can help me out
